Your Questions, Answered.

Most sessions last 3-5 hours per space. The exact time depends on the size of the area and the amount of items to organize. For larger projects, we may recommend multiple sessions.

I recommend & source products, but I don't sell them. After assessing your space, I'll provide a customized shopping list of recommended items that will work best for your specific needs.

Yes! Multi-session packages are available and recommended for larger homes or more complex organizing projects. We offer discounted rates for package bookings.

We primarily serve the greater Houston area. For locations outside this area, travel fees may apply. Virtual consultations are available nationwide.

No preparation is needed! We'll work together from the start. It's actually better if you don't pre-sort items so we can develop a system that matches your natural tendencies.
